name: SellerSprite - Amazon Research Tool
summary: Amazon seller research tool that performs TikTok data harvesting via fetch hooking and AI platform prompt injection across 6 AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, Doubao). Hooks window.fetch on TikTok to intercept all API responses for influencer marketing analysis.

vulnerabilities.title: TikTok Data Harvesting via Fetch Hooking
vulnerabilities.description: Hooks window.fetch in TikTok's MAIN world context to intercept all TikTok API responses including video lists, search results, shop data, and user profiles.

vulnerabilities.title: AI Platform Prompt Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Injects prompts into ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, and Doubao for market research purposes.

flags.description: Hooks window.fetch on TikTok to intercept all API responses for influencer/creator marketing data
Harvests TikTok video lists, search results, shop data and forwards to SellerSprite servers
